welcome.title: Welcome to {app}
welcome.body: Sign in securely and keep your data synced.

slides.title: Cross-Platform Sync
slides.subtitle: Always in Sync
slides.description: Keep your data seamlessly synced across all your devices. Start on your phone, continue on your tablet, and finish on your desktop.

slides.title: Secure & Private
slides.subtitle: Your Data is Yours
slides.description: With end-to-end encryption, your data is for your eyes only. We can't read it, and neither can anyone else.

slides.title: Offline Access
slides.subtitle: Work Anywhere, Anytime
slides.description: No internet? No problem. Access and manage your data even when you're offline. Changes will sync automatically when you reconnect.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this application, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

usePolicy.title: 2. Use Policy
usePolicy.content: You agree to use this application only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the application.

privacy.title: 3. Privacy Policy
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the application, to understand our practices.

modifications.title: 4. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any significant changes.

termination.title: 5. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

contact.title: 6. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@loginx.app

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use and protect your information.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support.

dataUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
dataUse.content: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure the security of our platform.

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties except as described in this policy.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also opt out of certain communications from us.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@loginx.app
